places_to_visit.name: Times Square
places_to_visit.description: Times Square is a bustling commercial and entertainment hub known for its bright lights, Broadway theaters, and massive electronic billboards. It's a must-visit spot for a quintessential New York experience.

places_to_visit.name: Central Park
places_to_visit.description: Central Park is an expansive green oasis in the heart of Manhattan, offering a range of activities from boating on the lake to strolling through beautifully landscaped gardens. It's a perfect place to relax and enjoy nature in the city.

places_to_visit.name: Statue of Liberty
places_to_visit.description: The Statue of Liberty, an iconic symbol of freedom, stands on Liberty Island. Visitors can take a ferry to the island to tour the statue and enjoy panoramic views of New York Harbor.

places_to_visit.name: Empire State Building
places_to_visit.description: The Empire State Building is a historic skyscraper with observation decks offering stunning views of New York City. The building is a symbol of the city's architectural prowess and has been featured in countless films.

places_to_visit.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
places_to_visit.description: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, commonly known as The Met, is one of the largest and most prestigious art museums in the world. It houses an extensive collection spanning thousands of years and various cultures.
